TopicTitle: How do you apply for volunteer experimental testing with the new forum structure?

Articles.Content:
I'm looking to send a request and see if I can support the development of the game testing the experimental releases. However, I can't find the option that was previously in the settings (where you sent a request off to become a volunteer test subject).

Can anybody help please?
You cannot apply yet. There are no open slots on the team and they are not seeking new people.
Aye, the setting was removed long ago when they fulfilled their quota of testers. There have been vague references to a possibility of opening up more places on the team, but nothing definite as yet.

Awww, ok. ;( Thanks for the replies.

EDIT: Feel free to lock this thread.
